job description
:
familiar with all parameters in instruments like pressure, temperature, flow and level. familiar with pressure measuring element like capsule, bellows, diaphragm and knowing pressure transmitter calibration and its apparatus. also know about temperature sensing
elements like rtd and its type tc and its type (like j, k, s, t, e, and r) radiation pyrometer
and calibration procedure of rtd
familiar with primary elements of flow measurement like orifice, venturi tube, pitot tube, annubar and rotameter. know about installation of dpt in gas, liquid and steam service
also knows dp and ft calibration.
measurement of level by direct and indirect method like bob and tab, side glass, float method, hydrostatic pressure, method, displacer method, bubbler tube method and electrical
method like capacitance type, ultrasonic type and radioactive. have idea about interface,
leveltrol. also know about zero suppression and zero elevation.
know about commissioning and pre commissioning maintenance (shut down, break down and preventive maintenance). also have knowledge about glanding. termination of cable in jb and
mc, star-up check. continuity test, leak test and function test.
familiar with control valve, parts of control valve, calibration and operation of control valve and symbols of control valves.
have knowledge about controller how it works about loop checking feedback and forward control. also know about hart, scada, plc, and dcs.
also know about pid diagram, calibration sheet filling, location diagram and logic diagram of plant.
calibration
: calibration of all type of transmitter, switches, gauge like pressure, temperature, flow
or level calibration of i/p and p/i converter and control valve.
3
loop chacking
: open loop checking. close loop checking.
declaration
:
i do hereby declare that all in statement as mentioned above is true to the best of my
